document_data.name: Keen Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''''Keen eye''''', also known as '''''bull's eye''''', was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Solonor Thelandira]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster or targeted creatures accuracy when firing a ranged missile weapon, such as a [[bow]], increased significantly.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Solonor Thelandira and a single feather from a [[hawk]].
